meta.title: Municipal Case Studies | Humble
meta.description: Battery deployments at open-street festivals, farmers markets, film productions, and city field operations.

hero.title: Built With Cities, Events, and Vendors
hero.description: We've powered everything from open-street festivals to film shoots in fire-prone areas. Experience across municipal operations, community events, and professional production.

items.title: Open-Streets Festival
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: 13 battery units deployed over 1+ mile route. Powered market stalls, stages, sound systems, and security infrastructure. Mixed loads from food vendor freezers to festival lighting. Zero noise complaints, zero emissions, zero refueling logistics during event.]

items.title: Parks Bounce House Pilot
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Multi-battery configurations for 4+ hour bounce house blower runtime at weekend park rentals. Feedback from families: cleaner air, no engine noise during birthday parties. City staff: easier permit process without generator fire risk concerns.]

items.title: Field Maintenance Crew
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Daily portable power for city maintenance operations. Overnight charging in yard. Lessons learned: importance of charging habits, cycle life monitoring, and over-provisioning to maintain availability during peak seasons.]

items.title: Fire-Risk Location Deployments
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Multiple productions in fire-prone areas where generators were banned by fire marshal. Batteries provided the only viable power source for wardrobe trucks, video village, and craft services. Uptime-critical applications where failure means production shutdown.]

items.title: Residential & Noise-Restricted Shoots
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Film and TV productions in residential neighborhoods with strict noise ordinances. Silent battery power enabled work during restricted hours. Location managers report fewer neighbor complaints and smoother permit renewals.]

items.title: Proven Reliability Under Pressure
items.description: Production environments demand absolute reliability â€“ one power failure can cost tens of thousands of dollars. Our fleet management approach, refined through years of high-stakes deployments, now serves municipal programs.

items.title: What Customers Say
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Pull quotes from event coordinators, city staff, and vendors. Examples: 'You can actually talk to customers without shouting over a generator' (market vendor). 'Cleanest community festival we've ever run' (city events coordinator).]
